name: Andreas Uhl
content: Homepage of Andreas Uhl Andreas Uhl Department Home Homepage of Andreas Uhl Project-group of Andreas Uhl (Research and Projects) Andreas Uhl's Students Information Page (German) Our University and Related Institutions Andreas Uhl I am a Full Professor for Computer Science at the Department of Computer Sciences at Salzburg University. I am heading the Multimedia Signal Processing and Security Lab (WaveLab-Group) - we are doing research in the areas of image and video processing, multimedia security, biometrics, medical imaging, and numerical mathematics. See my CV for various details on research, projects, publications, teaching, etc. Additionally, I am a lecturer at the Carinthia Tech Institute and at the Salzburg University of Applied Sciences. Current schedule: Monday Tuesday Wednesday Thursday Friday Morning TZ, 1.11 TZ, 1.11 TZ, 1.11 TZ, 1.11 TZ, 1.11 Afternoon TZ, 1.11 - TZ, 1.11 TZ, 1.11 TZ, 1.11 Absences: On vacation 24.8. - 12.9. Lecturing at Carinthia Tech Institute: Lecturing at Salzburg University of Applied Sciences: Conferences Information Security Conference, Pisa, Italy, September 7 - 9, 2009 Private Area:
